alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 9:27PM CDT until May 15 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Wisconsin... Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Grant, Crawford, Allamakee and Clayton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at McGregor. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM CDT Saturday was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 12.4 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning.
